issues.description: The template defines a constructor with only three parameters (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents) whereas the problem specification and reference solution require a constructor with five parameters (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors) in that order. This mismatch will cause student implementations and tests to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the constructor declaration in the template (Lecture.java) to include all five parameters in the correct order (String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) so that it matches the problem statement and reference solution.
